name: UFO battle: A fight to the death
name_original: UFO battle: A fight to the death
description:
We made this game as part of a university course. we still have a lot of bugs

this is a multiplayer game and we published two versions of the game.

The first is LAN version and the second uses Steam API for remote connection. 

To use the steam version make sure you open steam and start to host the game. 

after you host invite your friend that opened the game through steam friends list and make sure he didn't start a host.
